nodes.text: The Gunship Bomber Enhanced was a bomber employed by the Clone Army during the Clone Wars.

Similar in appearance to the LAAT/i, it was a successor to the Gunship Bomber and a predecessor to the Gunship Bomber Advanced. During the Battle of Aargonar, a Gunship Bomber Enhanced had crash-landed during the battle, where it was discovered by Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and A'Sharad Hett and later fixed up and used to lure a Gouka dragon to a Separatist hideout via its engines, manipulating the dragon's natural attraction to starship engines.
